content: ऊर्जित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} ({%a%}) Powerful, strong, mighty; मातृकं च धनुरूर्जितं दधत् <ls>R. 11. 64</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 76</ls>; vigorous, strong (speech); <ls>Śi. 16. 38</ls>; <ls>Ve. 1. 13.</ls> ({%b%}) Great, large, exceeding, much; <ls>Mv. 2. 13.</ls> {@--2@} Distinguished, glorious, superior; excellent, beautiful; °श्रीः <ls>Śi. 16. 85</ls>; मकरोर्जितकेतनं <ls>R. 9. 39</ls>; <ls n="R.">1. 93</ls>; <ls>Māl. 7. 4.</ls> {@--3@} High, noble, spirited; °आश्रयं वचः <ls>Ki. 2. 1</ls> spirited or noble. {@--4@} Increased; deep, grave; <ls>Ki. 11. 40.</ls> --तं {@--1@} Strength, might. {@--2@} Energy.
